channel.title: Loyalty Rewards.. Get items for being a member?
channel.description:
Loyalty Rewards (members) Last but not least, this month sees a huge selection of exciting rewards that you’ll be able to access through the Members Loyalty Program. Earn Loyalty Points to unlock a fantastic range of items, from custom titles to unique emotes, exclusive new costumes and amazing auras in a new player worn slot.
I'm not sure what to say...

item.title: Loyalty Rewards.. Get items for being a member?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:13, topic:397380”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=494525.msg3616742#msg3616742 date=1307048090]
They’re a company that needs money like any other.

  • this is good for us isn’t it? Free items.
    [/quote]
    Needs money? I’m sure the directors and the CEO has money…[/quote]

Fixed <3

Read full topic

item.title: Loyalty Rewards.. Get items for being a member?
item.dc:creator: @Roxee Roxee™
item.description:
@Roxee wrote:

I quit when old wild came back. Yes hate on me, I played classic along with most of you. But I started to like ep loot… The only chance of a worth-a-shit loot is if you can smite claws or if your good enough to dh pk.

Read full topic

item.title: Loyalty Rewards.. Get items for being a member?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:4, topic:397380”][quote]RuneScape ‎@Mitchell Keegan don’t worry we won’t make you pay anything extra. The loyalty program just takes into consideration how long you have been a member. It’s nothing to do with micro-transactions, it’s just some veteran benefits. ~Keildest[/quote][/quote]How long somebody has been a member? LOL…they have sold out. Definitely desperate.

Read full topic

[b]RuneScape[/b] ‎@Mitchell Keegan don't worry we won't make you pay anything extra. The loyalty program just takes into consideration how long you have been a member. It's nothing to do with micro-transactions, it's just some veteran benefits. ~Keildest
